articles.title: Mpox in Africa: WHO approves first mpox test for quick diagnosis - BBC.com
articles.description: Lack of testing and delays in getting the results have made curbing the virus's spread harder.
articles.content: The World Health Organization (WHO) has approved the first diagnostic test for mpox where the results can be immediately known, saying it could prove pivotal in helping to stop the rising global case… [+2087 chars]
